Grid Layouts

These layouts use grid patterns with mixed item sizes to create repeating patterns.
When you add more items, the pattern repeats automatically, indicated with gray elements.

3 Items

Grid 3a

2 small items in top row and 1 large item spanning horizontally at bottom <lay-out md="columns(3)" lg="grid(3a)">

Grid 3b

1 large item spanning horizontally at top and 2 small items at bottom <lay-out md="columns(3)" lg="grid(3b)">

Grid 3c

1 large item spanning vertically on the left and 2 small items on the right <lay-out md="columns(3)" lg="grid(3c)">

Grid 3d

2 small items on the left and 1 large item spanning vertically on the right <lay-out md="columns(3)" lg="grid(3d)">

4 Items

Grid 4a

1 large item spanning vertically on the left and 3 small items stacked on the right <lay-out md="columns(4)" lg="grid(4a)">

Grid 4b

3 small items stacked on the left and 1 large item spanning vertically on the right <lay-out md="columns(4)" lg="grid(4b)">

Grid 4c

1 large item spanning horizontally, 1 large item spanning vertically, and 2 small items <lay-out md="columns(4)" lg="grid(4c)">

Grid 4d

1 large item spanning vertically, 1 large item spanning horizontally, and 2 small items <lay-out md="columns(4)" lg="grid(4d)">

Grid 4e

1 large item spanning vertically, 2 small items stacked in middle, and 1 large item spanning vertically <lay-out md="columns(4)" lg="grid(4e)">

5 Items

Grid 5a

1 large item spanning horizontally at top and 4 small items in a grid below <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5a)">

Grid 5b

4 small items in a grid at top and 1 large item spanning horizontally at bottom <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5b)">

Grid 5c

1 large item spanning vertically on the left and 4 small items in a grid on the right <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5c)">

Grid 5d

4 small items in a grid on the left and 1 large item spanning vertically on the right <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5d)">

Grid 5e

2 small items, 1 large item spanning vertically, and 2 more small items <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5e)">

Grid 5f

1 large item spanning vertically on the left and 4 small items in a grid <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5f)">

Grid 5g

1 large item spanning vertically on the left and 4 small items in a grid <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5g)">

Grid 5h

4 small items and 1 large item spanning vertically on the right <lay-out md="columns(5)" lg="grid(5h)">
